headline: Is NVR (NVR) Fairly Priced After Recent Mixed Share Price Performance?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether NVR at around US$7,645 per share is priced fairly or not, you are not alone. This article is built to help you size up what you are really paying for. The stock has seen mixed returns, with gains of 1.1% over 7 days, 3.5% over 30 days and 5.0% year to date, set against a 6.8% decline over 1 year but much stronger 3 year and 5 year returns of 49.3% and 71.9%. Recent moves in NVR's share price sit against broader interest in US homebuilders and how higher...
